mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dnd.character ORDER BY user_alias;
mapper.update: UPDATE dnd.character SET API_ID = "${apiId}" where 1=1 and name = "${name}"
mapper.insert: insert into dnd.character_hist (characterId, damage_sendbag, instDate, buff, damage_siroco, buff_aria) values (#{id}, #{damageSendbag}, now(), #{buff}, #{damageSiroco}, #{buffAria})
